info.name: Archiveofourown.org - Spoiler / Blur Filter
info.description: CSS that hides / blurs out published and complete dates, word count, the number of chapters, rating, author notes and chapter numbers in works. Sections can be revealed by hovering your cursor over affected areas. Applies site wide. Style in action (gifs): Default look Works listing Story page On a dark theme Works listing Story page Code from Spoiler Prevention with CSS Filters and CSS Tricks - filter
